entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 7:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.5°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
